TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IRequestSessionChannel implements class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannel, class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel, class System.ServiceModel.Channels.ISessionChannel`1<class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputSession>, class System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject
Public Interface IRequestSessionChannel Implements IRequestChannel, ISessionChannel(Of IOutputSession)
type IRequestSessionChannel = interface interface ICommunicationObject interface ISessionChannel<IOutputSession> interface IChannel interface IRequestChannel

Docs.summary: Define a interface para associar um canal de solicitação a uma sessão.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
[!INCLUDE [untrusted-data-interface-note](~/includes/untrusted-data-interface-note.md)]
O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestSessionChannel> interface indica que um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel> implementa <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputSession> semântica.
O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputSession> associado com seu <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IReplySessionChannel> podem ser recuperadas por meio de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ISessionChannel%601.Session%2A> propriedade.
